subject: Add Lisa Commands section to HUMAN.md
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Add a Lisa Commands section to HUMAN.md after the SonarQube Commands section. Include all 4 Lisa commands in the table and add a detail section for `/lisa:learn`. Also add to the Command Call Graph.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Lisa Commands table added after SonarQube Commands (~line 103)
- [ ] Table includes all 4 Lisa commands: learn, review-implementation, review-project, integration-test
- [ ] Detail section for `/lisa:learn` added after SonarQube details (~line 287)
- [ ] Command Call Graph updated to include `/lisa:learn`

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`, `/jsdoc-best-practices`

**Verification:**
- Type: manual-check
- Command: `grep -c 'lisa:learn' HUMAN.md`
- Expected: At least 3 occurrences
